news.title: Trump launches 'large-scale' attack on Venezuela, captures Nicolas Maduro and wife
news.summary: Maduro and his wife were captured and removed from the country following the operation, Trump said in a statement on Truth Social. The operation was carried out by the U.S. Central Command.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
news.summary: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive. It was the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

news.title: Trump orders Chinese-controlled firm to unwind chip asset deal, citing national security risks
news.summary: The White House said the deal could threaten U.S. national security. A Chinese-controlled company must divest semiconductor assets it bought from Emcore.

news.title: Tesla reports 418,227 deliveries for the fourth quarter, down 16%
news.summary: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a steep rally in the company's stock in the last few months of 2025. Tesla's stock has risen more than 50% since the start of the year.

news.title: Buffett says Berkshire has the best odds of any company for lasting 100 more years as he hands over reins
news.summary: Berkshire has "a better chance I think of being here 100 years from now than any company I can think of," Buffett says.

news.title: U.S. on verge of unemployment surge that forces Fed to slash rates, Wall Street veteran says
news.summary: Those with optimistic views of 2026 are overlooking signs of a labor market in sharp decline, says David Rosenberg. Rosenberg: Those with optimistic outlooks are overlooking the decline of the U.S. labor market.

news.title: ‘I have absolutely no idea what to do’: I was diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and inherited $400K. How do I invest it?
news.summary: “I’m retired and 72. I don’t want to be here anymore,” he says. “I just want to go home.”

news.title: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived
news.summary: “It’s wrong to talk down to anyone,” he said. “If you have never found yourself in a situation where your life does a complete 180, it's wrong.”

news.title: Here are the most popular Moneyist columns of 2025
news.summary: Bad executors, greedy friends, inheritances, elder abuse and qualifying for Medicaid featured as the most-read Moneyist columns of the year.

news.title: Trump says U.S. has captured Maduro. What happens next in markets.
news.summary: The swift and successful U.S. operation to capture Venezuela president Nicolas Maduro is likely to pressure oil and could unleash a reaction in other financial markets.
